oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1958-05-31 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 31, 1958. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Ernest Tubb (host/performer), guest performers the Wilburn Brothers, and regular performers the Jordanaires, Tommy Jackson, Hank Garland, Rod Brasfield, and Del Wood. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN. It is announced that this is the 973rd broadcast.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Wilburn Brothers; Ernest Tubb; Jordanaires; Del Wood
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Prince Albert commercial (Ernest Tubb, Grant Turner) -- Prince Albert jingle -- Ernest Tubb introduces the Wilburn Brothers -- Hey, Mr. Bluebird (Wilburn Brothers, Ernest Tubb, Jordanaires) -- Ernest Tubb introduces Del Wood -- Raggin' The Keys (Del Wood) -- Ernest Tubb and Grant Turner talk -- Try Me One More Time (Ernest Tubb) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Ernest Tubb) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Station announcements (Grant Turner) -- Noel Hotel commercial (Grant Turner) (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Turner, Grant; United States. Armed Forces Radio Service; Brasfield, Rod; Wood, Del; Jackson, Tommy; Jordanaires (Musical group); Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Byrd, Billy; Tubb, Ernest, 1914-1984; Wilburn Brothers; Wilburn, Teddy; Wilburn, Doyle
